name: Lost Friends Adventure
description: This is a platformer game with multiple controllable characters that can be played by one or more players in split screen mode and you will need these characters to solve many puzzles and defeat some enemies in this game to progress through the levels and move around the map.

name: Lost in the Mirrors
description: Enter a mysterious mirror maze. Your cleaning job becomes a survival game as darkness falls. Mirrors reflect your fears, creating eerie illusions. Grasp your cleaning tools and wipe away stains - it's your only escape route. Clear all stains to flee this maze. Dare to face "Lost in the Mirrors"?

name: Rosttle
description: "Battle Roosters" is a solo-developed 2D top-down shooter where players must survive each round by collecting yellow energy dots on the field, navigating map obstacles, and employing various tactics to vanquish monsters, earn coins, and secure rewards.

name: Lost Heaven Station
description: Lost Heaven Station is a game BASE Build-Colony-Sim for players to manage crew to survive in their train and travel to find a ‘Lost Heaven’

name: Frost Survival VR
description: Face a frozen wilderness and try to survive. Build a shelter, craft tools, hunt for food, and manage your resources to endure harsh conditions. Strategize your moves against unpredictable weather and lurking dangers. And remember to keep yourself safe and sane!

name: EverChest: Pamalos Chronicles
description:
Would you be willing to become a knight? Or a legendary lord? The only way is to keep fighting! Are you ready to embark on the journey, brave Adventurer? This is a mysterious exploration with both risks and opportunities. Dark demons, dragons, goblins, dwarves, and other fantasy living creatures await you! Defeat them to get treasure chests, the most powerful heroes, and the cutest pets, keep expanding your territory, and upgrade your status!

It's a world of inspired fantasy, with treasure chests that bring wealth and powerful gear. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling but rewarding adventure?

name: Class Notes
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinity
description: This is a role-playing sci-fi game.Use the A and D keys to move your character.Manipulate the character to complete the interaction to achieve the ending, including state control, and the mode of input content.

name: 9 Days
description: You have 9 days before the final fight. At your current state, you do not stand a chance! Explore this Open World to gain new skills and abilities for the battle. Choose where you go, what you do carefully. You cannot waste time! You have 9 days.

name: Quinty
description: Quinty is an unreleased puzzle game that developed by Game Freak for the Super Famicom in 1999. The game was a remake of the Famicom/NES game of the same name, which is also titled Mendel Palace outside of Japan. On October 12, 2024, 3 prototype builds of the game were leaked during the 2024 Game Freak Leak.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Nijiiro Version
description: Taiko no Tatsujin: Nijiiro Version is a 2020 arcade installment in the Taiko no Tatsujin series. The game supersedes the Green Version.

name: Super Sentai Wars
description: Super Sentai Wars is a disconntinuted mobile game based on the Super Sentai series by GREE for legacy mobile devices.

name: Gullet
description: Gullet is a tension-fueled psychological horror game in which you will rappel down into and explore a colossal mouth post-rapture and control how quickly you descend by how tightly you squeeze your left hand brake in real life and in the game.

name: AmaZoo
description: AmaZoo is a progressive and varied puzzle game, inspired by the classic video game Sokoban, but presented in side-view, like the old classic 2D games. In this game, you can solve a multitude of puzzles and put your logical mind to the test, moving and organizing different types of boxes to reach the exit and progress to the next stage. But be careful— some boxes are fickle, and watch your step!

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Flash Edition
description: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Flash Edition is a fanmade Flash game based on the game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire created by Newgrounds user Frenzy.

name: Chi Vuol Essere Milionario?
description: Chi Vuol Essere Milionario? is an Italian interactive DVD game based on the Who Wants to Be a Millionaire series.

name: Intelligent Strategy Games 10
description: The Amiga port has the same games but with re-done graphics

name: My Imaginary Friend
description:
My imaginaryFriend is a first-person horror game that focuses on psychological horror. Set in the mandela catalogue universe, My Imaginary Friend is a 3d realistic first person horror game that features how AI uses the imagination of children to generate intruders and potentially alternates.
You will be playing as Jonny, 10 year old boy, the game begins after he discovers that his parents are not home and something is terribly wrong with the place.

name: Cleveland 1968
description: Sin descripción

name: The Psychologist
description: A point-and-click survival horror game, you play as a psychologist. Complete evaluations while preventing your anxiety from escalating. Can you survive The Company?

name: Messticulous
description: Aim and throw incongruous objects to create an organized mess by following the directives of a completely wacky "tidy up" system!

name: Hatch Tales: A Heroic Hookshot Adventure
description:
Hookshot your way through a unique platforming adventure
Embark on an action-packed platforming quest across the mystical lands of Talonreach. Join Hatch, a flightless hawk mountaineer equipped with a powerful hookshot, on a perilous journey to confront the evil Nazar, and save the kingdom from his icy grip.

The many tales of Hatch's saga will take him from the comfort of his homeland to the far, untamed edges of the kingdom. Encountering powerful foes and dangerous hazards. Unlocking amazing abilities and experiencing wonders never before dreamed of. Whether these tales end in triumph, or become cautionary, rests on the shoulders of our young hero.

name: Exclusive Memory
description: Three Days of Crisis: Exclusive Memories "is a suspenseful love story full dynamic live action interactive video game. The whole game is a process of exploration and puzzle solving, in which you will delve into a complex and mysterious story. Collect clues through interactions with different characters, solve puzzles, and gradually uncover the truth hidden behind them

name: The Exit Project: Backstreets
description: Don't get stuck in this loop for the rest of your life.

name: Survivor's Dawn
description: Survive in a challenging 2D zombie game! Face hordes of the undead, earn money by defeating them, and buy upgrades to increase your health, ammo, and more. How far can you go?

name: Skydivers Paradise
description:
Can you take a simple step at 3 kilometers above the ground? Just hold your breath and push yourself to the limit. Everyone feels the fear, but not everyone can ignore it.

Skydiving is teamwork. Take your place in the beautiful figures at the speed of free fall. You have to stay calm and control the situation to get as many points as possible. Everyone in the team is counting on you.

name: Archery Legend
description: Unleash your archery skills! Step into the world of precision and strategy with Archery Legend. With 5 unique bows and arrows at your disposal, conquer 50 thrilling levels spread across 5 beautifully themed stages.

description: Eight women simultaneously appear in your life, offering you unconditional love and support! Will you choose to uphold your beliefs and become a good man, or give in to human temptations and become a bad man?

Embark on an exciting adventure deep into the wilderness with Safari Puzzle Match!
Test your memory and sharpen your skills across four difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard and Expert.
Match unique animal-themed cards in each level and strive for victory.
Capture the spirit of the safari and solve puzzles to earn rewards. The perfect memory game for nature lovers!

name: PizzaBoy
description:
Take control of PizzaBoy, a nimble pizza delivery guy equipped with an air dash that allows him to bounce off walls. This can be used to reach greater heights and distances than the standard run and jump. PizzaBoy must navigate dangerous environments to deliver pizzas to hungry monsters.

Pizzaboy must make it to the end of the level to deliver the pizza but don't expect it to be too simple, as each area is full of pizza-hungry monsters. Don't get too close or they might just steal a slice! The customer won't be happy with a half-eaten pizza.

The path to the customer won't always be straightforward either. Every level is a Metroidvania-style map, with many secrets, collectibles, and areas to explore. Alongside delivering pizzas, PizzaBoy may find opportunities to recover his lost memories and discover the dark secrets of the company he works for. The player's choice in how they tackle the level will determine the ending of each chapter, and ultimately the end of the game.

If the customer is satisfied with your performance, you might just get a 5-star review.

name: Color Swiper
description: In "Color Swiper", 30 tricky levels full of challenges await you, where you have to put your skills and strategy to the test. Use clever swiping movements to fill all the fields and solve exciting color puzzles. Sounds easy? Think again - every move counts!

Issue orders to your squad, manage its members and their equipment, but most importantly – complete your objectives successfully. Follow your operatives into a number of high-risk missions that will test your tactical abilities.

name: Marvel Mystic Mayhem
description: Join forces with iconic Super Heroes as they clash with the sinister forces of Nightmare, the malevolent lord of the Dream Dimension, as he seeks to dominate the waking world. Get a glimpse into the deepest fears of Super Heroes such as Scarlet Witch, Moon Knight, and Captain America as Nightmare transforms their dreams into dangerous dungeons. Drawing energy from the Mindscape, Doctor Strange and Sleepwalker must arm their allies with dream energy to form a three-hero battle team delving into the heart of each harrowing nightmare to avert the collapse of reality.

name: Bubbits
description: Bubbits is a next generation Bubble Shooter. Compete in a 25 Player Online Battle Royale, Play VS with friends or CPU or go Solo. Customize your Playfield, unleash Power Ups and experience crazy battle events!

name: Catch the Sperm
description: Catch the Sperm is a promotional game to raise awareness for HIV. The game was developed for the Stop AIDS campaign in 2001 (a joint prevention campaign by the Swiss Federal Ministry of Health and Swiss Aids Federation) in Switzerland. The player has to protect a couple having sex by shooting condoms at sperm cells and HIV viruses to catch them. The condom gun is located at the right side of the screen and can be moved up and down with the mouse, while sperm cells and HIV viruses are entering the screen on the left side. The goal is to catch as many sperm cells and HIV viruses as possible within 90 seconds. The game is immediately lost if a HIV virus reaches the other side of the screen. For each catch the player gets points, while each shot costs points.

name: Age of Castles
description: Age of Castles is a strategy game. Choose a character and reign over your people as prince, dwarf, wizard or warrior. Collect taxes, write laws and build a castle to fight dragons and enemy armies. 18 scenarios are included in the campaign.

name: Villainous
description: A reverse tower defence game, where you play as the leader of an evil army, sending hordes of monsters against your foes, conquering one kingdom at a time.

name: Anime Parody: Tentacle Slayer
description: Play as a tentacle monster, exploring a tragicomic love story from the perspective of a classic hentai villain. Encounter various QTE-style challenges without any jigsaw puzzles.

name: Dawn
description: WITNESS THE DAWN! A new horror stirs in The American West. It isn’t an ordinary night. The storm outside was just the start. The wind. The rain. An omen of things to come. Attempt to escape and survive the horror as one of two characters, solo, or together with a friend.

name: Helicopter Flight Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Linxicon
description:
There are enough word games out there to teach you how to spell. Linxicon is a game teaches you what words mean!

Your goal is to connect two random words by creating a chain of new words that bridge the gap in their meanings. For example, the words “link” and “lexicon” don't have much in common, but you can create a bridge between them.

There is only one pair of words to connect per day, but you can practice as much as you'd like. A new game will start at 20:00 EST every day.

name: Collection of Most Awful Things that Could Ever Happen on St. Valentine's Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Siegius
description: Become the Roman Legion, the Gallic tribes, or a group of wild boars in this tactic game! Defend the Roman empire, lead an assault on Rome, or do whatever boars do, it's your choice.

name: GatePass
description: A 2D platformer game with strong puzzle elements. Escape the 100-level labyrinth and return home safely.

name: Lab 77
description: The game you will love to make your friends play. In Lab 77 you play as Specimen S539-77, making your way through the challenges of Lab 77's test chambers under the supervision of the Director. Place versions of yourself to bridge gaps, collect lab notes, avoid dangers and complete your training.

name: Siren
description: Sin descripción

description: Bubble matching arcade game.

name: Es
description: Es is an action game developed by 9thNight (Arthearts). The game was cancelled in 2007, having released only a Beta of the first two levels.

name: Buckshot to Hell
description: Russian roulette game where you can have fun with friends or compete with other people!

name: Bankiware
description: This game was created in a short period of time for the Touhou Game Jam 2024.

name: Gran Saga Idle: Knights x Knights
description:
Adventure in the Esprogen continent, the Great Continent, and the Gerus Empire,
Build relationships with veteran warriors and make them your friends!
By exchanging, combining and developing skills,
Build your own powerful knight group!
4294967296 is an unofficial 2048 clone game which has the player aim to get the 4294967296 tile within a 16x16 play field.

name: War Heli
description: War Heli was developed in 1987 by the two Swiss crackers M. Heubi und M. Köhler for the Atari ST platform. War Heli is a vertical shoot 'em up in a war setting. The player pilots a helicopter through an area where he has to destroy all enemy tanks. He has to be careful not to hit any ambulances. If he does so, his score gets set to zero. War Heli is a challenging game with high standards in graphics and technique for its time. War Heli came with a then unique feature: you could save the game to the disk and continue later. Further artists of the Argonica team were: T. Steimle, R. Gafner and H.P. Gysel.

name: Robox
description: A German text adventure game with High-Res graphics and text published in 64'er Software Extra Nr.04: Abenteuer-Spiele - Volume 1. In the distant future you're the winner of a trip to a holiday planet. And an adventure ensues....Swiss Commodore 64 game developed by Laro Schatzer and Marc Pilloud.

name: Plush Hospital
description: Care for and heal the cutest plushies in town! Welcome to Plush Hospital, a place to take care of quite unusual -- and very fluffy -- patients, including the Teddy Bear, the Soft Kitty, the Goofy Puppy and the Sweet Bunny! Repair, clean, customize and play with toys in Plush Hospital. They’re already waiting for you!

name: Cherry Jump
description: Cherry Jump is a 2D platformer where players race through levels, collecting cherries and aiming for the fastest completion time. The game features multiple paths, achievements to unlock, and various characters to discover. Players test their speed and skill in this fast-paced pixel art world.

name: The Doinksoft Collection
description:
The Doinksoft collection bundles three action-packed games on a single cartridge, and all of them are a good fit for the Switch's mobile-centric design.

First up is Gato Roboto. You're a cute cat piloting a cozy armored mech in this game, a metroidvania with stylish monochromatic visuals. As you trek through an alien underworld full of irritable creatures and treacherous obstacles, you'll get closer to rescuing your stranded captain and salvaging his crashed spaceship. You'll need to blast and dash through dangerous terrain, as well as venture outside the mech and risk all nine lives to access areas and uncover cool secrets.

Gunbrella will see you engage in side-scrolling action as you use the lethal rain-deflecting tool to glide, swing, dash, and shoot your way through people who are out for your head. A gritty noir-punk action-adventure game with heaps of fun platforming, you'll also interrogate bizarre characters on your quest for answers in this thrilling game.

Finally, Demon Throttle tells the story of a beautiful vampiress and dusty gunslinger on a quest for vengeance. A demon has been up to no good and has wronged both of the unlikely partners, and revenge calls for a violent assault on that fiend's domain. Interestingly, Demon Throttle was only available as a physical Switch game, so this is a fresh chance to play Demon Throttle and experience its arcade action in case you missed its limited release the first time around.

name: Yoku aru Dasshutsu Game: Gakushu Tengoku
description: Yoku aru Dasshutsu Game: Gakushu Tengoku, is a modified version of Common Game of Escape made exclusively available on the gakuten.com website.

name: Half-Life: History of Kumertau
description: Half-Life: History of Kumertau is a work-in-progress singleplayer first-person shooter video game, based on a custom Half-Life 1 SDK known as PrimeXT SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.

name: Imada ni Yokuaru Dasshutsu Game
description: Imada ni Yokuaru Dasshutsu Game, also commonly referred to as "Dona Room 3" or "Dona's Room 3" in the West, is the third game in a series of escape games by Naoki Nakashima.

name: Ao Oni R
description: The 'R' in Ao Oni R can stand for a lot of things - such as reboot, remake, or retelling, but at its core it is a labor of love. It is the Ao Oni experience everyone knows and loves, having been rebuilt from the ground up in RPG Maker VX Ace to expand upon the original games ideas while giving it a fresh coat of paint. New story elements and areas, graphics, music, sound, puzzles, expanded character backgrounds as well as multiple endings exist in Ao Oni R while still keeping the principles of the original, such as a low amount of dialogue when possible and the possibility of a fast play through.

name: Temehuatzl
description: A morning stroll through a slightly hazy, partially flooded jungle temple.

name: The Witch of the Wake
description: The Witch of the Wake is a seafaring supernatural horror/thriller visual novel inspired by media such as The Thing, The Terror, and Return of the Obra Dinn.

name: Anomaly Tapes: Beyond Reality
description: Uncover the truth in '[ANOMALY TAPES]: Beyond Reality'. Navigate through haunting levels, survive deadly anomalies with unique mechanics, and piece together a chilling mystery hidden within the tapes. Dare to uncover the secrets?

name: DodecaDragons
description: DodecaDragons is an incremental game created by Demonin. DodecaDragons utilizes stacking layers of prestige systems to use player's resources, and keep them relevant through the entire game.

name: Paraedolon
description:
A short experimental experience.

A meteor approaches Earth from deep space. Carrying an unknown malevolent force.

name: Lucky Defense
description: A casual tower defense all about LUCK! Summoning units is all based on LUCK! Yes, it's a tower defense game! Defeat the monsters! You can also merge units! You just never know what you'll get!

name: VisualHacker2D
description: Set in a world of Magic, Hacking and Augmentations, rescue your newborn baby from the evil clutches of the Hospital Corporation. "If you can't pay your bill, we will auction her off like property". Will you pay or will you fight your way up the 4 floors of the hospital and fight to save your baby?

name: Captain of the Guard
description: You have been charged with the defense of a new settlement in a hostile land. Prepare your guards and send them into battle against the horde of creatures that stalk the wilderness. As time passes and the settlement grows, so do the threats that you face.

name: Garden Snap
description: A relaxing game where you can remove alien plants to restore the forest. No quests or enemies, just relaxing. You can also change the weather if you prefer rain. Alternatively, you can also just walk around in nature in a peaceful forest.

name: ­Into the Deep Dark Green Sleep
description: A story woven with the sound of rain, poetic text, and gentle narration... A short visual novel where you can spend a relaxing moment in your own place, with time to yourself, where no one will disturb you, no one will come barging in. It could be a small, secretive café.

name: Cute Bless
description: Cute Bless is a game where cuteness is deceptive. Defeat various bosses to try to fill your emptiness. Or simply wander through the cities trying to find an explanation for the cuteness around you.

name: Em.Path
description: Immersive witch and camping simulator set in a surreal world glitched beyond salvation. Travel and maintain your RV, pickup strange hitchhikers, study the occult and rewrite the laws of nature

name: GladMort
description: In a faraway kingdom in a land of legend, a mysterious plague of unknown origin has rapidly infected the population. Dubbed the "Red Plague", the evil nature of the phenomenon is unmistakable: the dead begin to rise from their graves, and demonic incarnations begin to appear.

name: Decksplorers: Into the Shell
description: Dive into the world of Decksplorers: Into the Shell, where deckbuilding card combat meets real-time action in a thrilling roguelite adventure! Master the art of strategic card play, swift reflexes, and exploration as you venture into the mysterious ever-changing caves of "The shell"

name: Glow Up 2
description: Glow up the characters for each of the 9 stages, Units are divided into red and blue teams for auto-battle. Click to predict the winning team. If you guess right, you will be able to see the whole of the characters that have been Glow up.

name: Golf In Wonderland
description: Dive into a fantastical adventure where sport and fantasy come together in a world as delirious as it is enchanting. Welcome to "Golf in Wonderland," a unique golf game that transports you to the heart of the wonderland.

name: Castle Rain
description: Castle Rain is a 3D top-down action game where you control Billy, a mushroom whose island was devastated by a villain who turned his friends and everyone around into manipulated zombies.

name: True Love
description: If you are looking for the True Love... Here you go xd

name: Anomalia O Despertar
description: Titan Tech was a factory known for creating machines that advanced humanity, but it was suddenly shut down with the disappearance of several employees. When you wake up you will come across machines that will try to catch you, Be smart and survive, death will be the least of your worries.

name: Seekers of Darkness
description: Dive into "Seekers of Darkness," a thrilling deck-building roguelike RPG with intense card battles and tower defense RTS elements. Unlock powerful characters, build unique strategies with over 70 cards, and compete in offline rankings. Burn enemies, freeze them, or overpower with weapons. Enjoy!!

name: Candy Golf
description: Minigolf game. 3 different levels with totally 42 holes. Play alone or against bots

name: TeleMorpher
description: "Telemorpher" is a high-tech weapon that can shoot teleportation spheres. With it, you can teleport to the sphere's location. Your sole objective is to use this gun to escape from the mysterious laboratory!

name: Entombed
description: You wake up in the middle of the night. The lights are all off and something feels off. You grab your flashlight and try to figure out the source of this anomaly. However, you grow hungry and head to the kitchen where things start to go horribly wrong.

name: Festival Fever
description: Festival Fever is a music festival management sim which sees the player take control and tasks them to build and manage the best festival in the world!

name: The Wanderer
description: "There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy."

name: Popit Sanic Goo!
description: An awesome and colorful Match 3 adventure with lot of characters and powerups, make them pop and unlock new areas and levels, some are relaxing and others are challenging. Ame roes, taels, big da cat , shedew and more are here!

name: Pawelek the Game.
description: Pawełek The Game is a game full of challenges, jokes and twists. Take on the role of a pawelek, craft items, fight and earn new Loot and uncover the truth about your love

name: HighKing
description: Use your mouse to climb the mountain. The road is very steep and long. But don't worry. You can use your arms and legs for this climb.

name: Goner In The Town
description: Goner In The Town” is a 3D FPS RPG game in which players explore a section of a city cut off from another world and fight enemies by switching between four different guns. The game takes place in the present day,

name: Mindbreak Mansion
description: Enter the enigmatic world of Mindbreak Mansion, where puzzles and mysteries await around every corner. Solve intricate challenges, unlock hidden secrets, and unravel the mysteries of this captivating adventure. Will you escape the mansion's grasp, or succumb to its mind-bending allure?

name: The Core
description: A game in the TPS / Topdown Shooter genre. eliminate enemies with various abilities such as slowing down time, protect the core until it activates again, defeat the boss. You can try again and again with various difficulty.

name: Welcome to Ela
description: Welcome to Ela is an active-time battle RPG in which you explore the wicked city of Ela, a place filled with the horrors of the common life. Prepare yourself to face the threats awaiting in your journey, gather resources, unlock new abilities and escape this hopeless place before it's too late.

name: Lunar // Drill
description: LUNAR//DRILL is a Couch-Coop Bossfight for two players! Play Luna & Drillian, two aliens with unique spaceships and abilities. Work together to defeat the Mecha-Spider attacking your moon!

name: Mytho Duel
description: It's an adaptation of the classic card game "Triple Triad" for an interactive in-menu experience. This game offers engaging and strategic gameplay, allowing players to challenge their own strategic planning skills.

name: Take Off Mask
description: is a strategic action RPG where you can enjoy dozens of unit battles. Exploration and combat can reveal the secrets of the mysterious world, find hidden colleagues, and challenge the wider area. challenge the Devil of the North with the best combat power.

name: Carsh
description: Carsh is a battle royale game where you drive a car and play a puzzle game at the same time. Enjoy the most heated battles you have ever experienced.

name: BeeFriend
description: BeeFriend is a cozy simulation game where you tend to honey bees and expand your apiary. Build hives, gather honey, and create a thriving bee haven. Turn your beekeeping hobby into a famous enterprise. Enjoy nurturing your colonies, observing bees, and the peaceful life of a beekeeper.

name: Kiwamete Yoku aru Dasshutsu Game
description: Kiwamete Yokuaru Dasshutsu Game, also commonly referred to as "Dona Room 4" or "Dona's Room 4" in the West, is the fourth and final game in a series of escape games by Naoki Nakashima.

name: Warp Speed: Infinity
description: Put your reflexes to the ultimate test with this unique arcade-style racing game: Warp speed: Infinity. Make your way through space at incredible speeds while dodging asteroids and space junk. Unlock a variety of different ships with unique features and handling by reaching ever higher scores.

name: Rules of War
description: A simple 4X Turn-based military strategy game with missile warfare. Command troops, expand your borders, and launch missiles against your enemies. Balance expansion, technology, and diplomacy. Can you lead your nation to victory?

name: The Last Bullet
description:
The Last Bullet (also known as The Last Bullet: Updated) is a total conversion Half-Life modification, one of the alternate histories inspired by the Wolfenstein series of games and other iconic 3D shooters.

The mod started back in 2017, however the development was left unfinished after v1.4.5 release and the localization patches. In 2020, the development started to continue, according to the developer, as a remaster (TLB: Updated) and polishing to a reasonable and playable state with a WW2 theme, which In addition to new maps, weapons and characters, you will find an expanded plot.

name: Constance the Barbarian
description:
Constance the Barbarian - A humourous take on Conan the Barbarian/Xena Warrior Princess, with a dash of Monkey Island.

Originally made for September 04 MAGS, and as a learning project. But decided to make it as a demo/teaser for a larger more involved game. I won't hazard a release date at this point. I'm mostly improving my artwork skills.

name: Gravitational Phenomenon
description: IN THIS 3D ARCADE PLATFORMER GAME AN UNKNOWN CATACLYSM HAS ROCKED THE EARTH THE LAWS OF PHYSICS NO LONGER APPLY YOU MUST DESCEND THROUGH THE WRECKAGE Back to the OLD WORLD, TO EARTH

name: Good Boy
description: An ecosystem driven metroidvania on the mysterious planet of Terra II! Take control of Good Boy and explore the strange new world! Complete quests for other good boys and girls, capture and research exotic alien life, and forge a relationship with your new human friend!

name: Portal Protectors
description: Take the journey of the Portal Protector as you defend the portals to the divine realm from evil. Use strategy and skill to aid you in your defense against evil using magic, sword skills, and defensive towers. For you are the Portal Protector!

name: Skeletos Sword
description: Skeletos Sword plunges players into a thrilling third-person sword battle against a legion of crazed skeletons.

name: Greed
description: This is a tower defense and RPG game, harvests resources, explores the world, finds new towers, collects rare material, builds and updates towers, and defends against monsters. But the more resources you harvest, the stronger the monster.

name: The Father's Story
description: Set in the first century, The Father's Story is a visual novel which offers a different perspective of the Christmas Story and the events surrounding that night.

name: Key Fairy

name: White Heaven
description: Canceled sequel to the 2012 Adventure-Horror game 'Anna.' White Heaven was to take place in an abandoned hotel nestled in the Italian Alps, eponymously titled White Heaven. Its narrative focuses on a kidnapped victim escaping his captivity after having fallen in love with one of his captors. The game was to follow three playable characters while continuing to explore the backstory of its predecessor rather than serving as a direct continuation. Early footage showcased chase sequences, which weren't attempted in the developer's previous work. The game was announced in 2013 and was being created in Unreal Engine 4 with an additional extension to aid with dynamic lighting. In 2020, its developers announced a cancelation of this iteration of the game, as they felt it to be "too much, too soon" in terms of the story they were attempting to tell.

name: Lu Ye Xian Zong
description:
A platformer in which the player has to guide the characters from the film with each of them having their own abilities. The plot follows that of the 1939 movie.

Many of the graphics are ripped from numerous other games. The title screen bears a strong resemblance to Castle of Dragon's intro. Barza from Kyoryu Sentai Zyuranger is used in the cutscenes, the "To Green Castle" signs are taken from Mickey Mousecapade, the "Good luck!" message in the opening story being taken from Crossfire, the windows in the first level are likely re-edits of those from Hummer Team's Aladdin pirate, and Willy from Rockin' Kats shows up several times in the ending sequence.

As well as this, the mushroom enemy is taken from Don Doko Don 2 and the small one-eyed green blobs that the frog spits at you are the aliens from one of the bosses in Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers for NES, while one more enemy is from Little Samson. A few enemies are taken from Panic Restaurant, such as the jumping sausage (re-colored to green). The last boss is copied from Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers 2 being re-drawn in other colors and with new attacks.

The music is original, but the sound engine is stolen from Konami. Many of the sound effects also come from Konami games, most notably the death sound being the same as the one in Contra.

name: QuizMania
description:
QuizMania is an italian exclusive collection of minigames that takes place in a network of tv channels. The player will be introduced to the game itself and to all the mini-games by its only host Raul Cremona, which interprets different characters, one for each game plus the menu and a pirate television that will randomly appear during the gameplay.
The included games are
- TeleTre: A classic quiz with a question and three possible answers
- TeleIndovinelli: A riddle to resolve, where the only input for the player is for revealing the answer
- TeleAnagrammi: with a given word, create another word by mixing its letters
- TeleRebus: write the phrase by resolving a riddle with a drawing and some letters
- TeleLabirinti: multiple letters are arranged in a square formation. The player has to connect all of them to create a phrase
- TeleIntruso: find the word that doesn't fit with the other four

name: SCP: Mystery Man
description:
Dive into the enigmatic world of "SCP - The Mystery Man," an Alternate Reality Game (ARG) that blurs the lines between reality and fiction. In this immersive experience, you become the investigator, unraveling the secrets of the SCP Universe through a series of intricate puzzles and cryptic clues.

In "SCP - The Mystery Man," you will explore a rich narrative by decoding messages, solving riddles, and scouring the depths of the internet for hidden information. Clues are scattered throughout the game in various forms—text, images, and videos—all carefully designed to guide you deeper into the mystery.

Your mission is to track down the elusive Mystery Man, piece together fragments of evidence, and unveil the dark secrets that lie beneath. Use the in-game note-taking feature to keep track of your discoveries and insights, helping you connect the dots in this complex investigation.

Every clue brings you closer to the truth, challenging your wit and determination. Whether you’re interpreting a cryptic message, analyzing a suspicious image, or deciphering an obscure video, each piece of the puzzle is vital to your success.

Are you ready to immerse yourself in the shadowy depths of the SCP Universe and uncover the mysteries that await? Embark on your investigative journey with "SCP - The Mystery Man" and see if you have what it takes to solve the enigma.

Its minimalistic yet challenging design paired with its great music has made Sensitive a memorable classic for C64 fans.
