description: Silence the chaos, one swing at a time!

name: Primal Hearts 2
description: As new rivalries and old divisions threaten to split Ainoshima apart once again, only a new “Triple Seven” can restore peace once more! Torn between the machinations of the Liberal Arts and Sports factions, can our hero heal everyone's hearts—and steal just one?

name: Mario's Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Winter Mario Games 2009
description: This winter game includes winter remakes of Super Luigi Paradise and Mario's Run. In addition to this, extra new levels have been added.

name: Super Mario Bros: Restless Reality
description: Many years have passed since the Mario Bros last defeated Bowser and stopped his plans for world domination. The Mushroom Kingdom enjoyed years of peace. Until one day... Bowser is up to no good again! He is invading the once peaceful kingdom, and setting up forts! What could he be planning!? Mario must travel through many different locations to find out what Bowser is up to and stop his evil plans!

name: Super Mario Bros: Mythical Mushrooms
description: There is a legend that tells of five mythical mushrooms of untold power. Mario sets off on a journey to collect these mushrooms in this challenging metroidvania platformer.

name: Yokai Busters
description: Yokai Busters is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find a police officer, a caring mom, a shrine maiden, and more! Explore the maps and have a blast battling with your favorite Japanese girls, and Yokai!

name: Super Mario Bros: Ztar Turmoil
description: A dark force has begun to sweep over the Mushroom Kingdom. Guns have been introduced into the world mysteriously, and are being used to bring about death and destruction. It is up to Mario (or Luigi) to save the Mushroom Kingdom from the Ztars.

name: Yoshi Tanks
description: In Yoshi Tanks, the aim of the game is to take out all of your opponent tanks, whether they are your friends, or AI controlled.

name: Super Mario Eclipse
description: The eclipse stars, a source of mythical powers, have been unleashed upon the world. As a result, the entire Mushroom Kingdom has been shrouded in the shadows of an everlasting eclipse. It is up to Mario to collect these stars, and save everyone from an eternal twilight.

name: Succubers! Dark Covenant
description: Succubers! Dark Covenant is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find nurses, nuns, housewives, and more! Explore the maps with your favorite characters and achieve your ultimate dreams!

name: Super Mario Dynamo
description: The people of the Mushroom Kingdom have finally embraced industrialization, and it is all thanks to everyone's favorite plumber, Luigi! Unfortunately, Luigi's greed got the best of him, and the entire kingdom became shrouded in darkness. The thick smog emanating from Luigi's accomplishments have darkened the once bright and colorful kingdom. It is now up to Mario to try and solve this dilemma!

name: Hello Fangaming Collection
description: Join Mario and Luigi on their adventure in this ten year anniversary collection! This collection includes an assortment of remastered levels handpicked from a wide variety of fangames released by Hello Fangaming between 2006-2016.

name: Super Mario Prism
description: The Sprixie princess has been trapped in one of the painting worlds! It is now up to Mario to rescue her by collecting the power stars to restore color to the paintings in this 3D platformer!

name: Mario Editor
description: With Mario Editor, it's easy to play, create, and share your very own custom Mario levels! Utilize a massive selection of powerups, enemies, items, and other goodies in your creations.

name: Night Shift Nurses
description: A washed-up mad doctor is hired back by a devious former test subject and asked to twist her hospital into a corrupt donation mill. Will he seize this second chance to practice his own vision of "science," or will his many failings drag him down once again in this pseudo-medical visual novel?

name: Shroom Editor
description: Sin descripción

name: The Shroom Project
description: The zombie apocalypse is nigh! The world is in utter chaos, and death is commonplace. A malicious group is responsible for all of this destruction, and is busy at work on a dark scheme known as The Shroom Project. Play as one of two characters, join a rag tag team known as The Resistance, and fight back against a mysterious, yet, familiar face!

name: Psycho
description:
Psycho is a graphic adventure game with a key-based verb interface.

A set of jewels has been stolen. At the time of the theft, a curator was with the jewels, so he got stolen, too. And who's the suspect? Norman Bates, of course. The next night, a daring detective drives out to the sinister Bates Motel. His plan: a) find the jewels, b) free the curator and c) take a nice hot shower, should time suffice.

Psycho is entirely controlled with the keyboard: direction keys for moving your character around, shortcut keys for performing actions. You need to stand close to an interesting object in order to examine it. Adversaries will appear at random throughout the house, putting you to sleep by touch and thus draining your precious time -- you've only got four hours to solve the case. You may shoot the enemies as soon as you find a weapon. As there is no other option for character interaction, this is how you'll deal with the Bates family as well.

name: Break Wolf
description: An Adventure RPG that deals with the life and death of wayward humans, striving to escape a syndicate that creates monsters.

name: Alfred Hitchcock’s Psycho Adventure Game
description:
Alfred Hitchcock’s Psycho Adventure Game is a classic point and click game.

This game created by one single person is a short "9 verbs" point & click adaptation in pixel art inspired by the classic Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho movie. It reinterprets the iconic scene of the film.

It follows the scenario of the original movie adding some new features...

You have to resolve some puzzles to progress in the game. Talk with characters, interact with your environment, use your collected item...to unlock the next challenge.

name: Stars Era: The Final Defence
description: We will be the last guardian of the planet, here will be our final line of defense. The Clyde Star Spaceguard will fight to the last moment.

name: Revert
description: In Revert, use the time-manipulation powers granted to you by the Animal Spirits to solve over 40 puzzles in this puzzle-platformer. You start out with the ability to Save the state of the world, and Revert to go back to how it was. Solve puzzles with the world now reorganized! As you progress, unlock more time-manipulation powers to solve increasingly complex levels. Use your powers sparingly, and you’ll please the Animal Spirits.

name: Robo Dome
description: Compete in the famed Robo Dome championship as Rei Castor. Test your ability in this roguelite shoot em’ up against a barrage of enemies and projectiles. Face off against giant robots and other contestants in an attempt to come on top of this year’s Robo Dome championship in Valhalla City.

name: The King of Fighters XIV: 4 Character Bundle Pack 2
description: This bundle includes the additional 4 characters ('OSWALD', 'HEIDERN', 'NAJD' and 'BLUE MARY'). These characters will be playable in 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIV' with this bundle purchase.

name: I Have One Day
description: Finding yourself imprisoned, you have 1 day to solve your predicament, and save the kingdom from destruction, or suffer multiple game overs trying, in this point and click adventure game.

name: My First Quantum Translocator
description: Help Quantum Translocator Guy through multiple rooms of puzzles in this platformer, where you can manipulate physics to surpass any obstacle in your way.

name: King of Fighters XV: Garou MotW Terry Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Friction
description:
Friction is a light-gun shooting game where players must navigate through three challenging levels full of varied gameplay and enemies. The 3D rail shooter is the first game developed by newly formed Friction Game Studios.

There are over 14 different enemies to shoot your way through, each with varied attack behaviours, as well as unique transforming bosses with special attacks to overcome. To keep things interesting, the game features fully destructible level geometry, a variety of different weapons and powerups, and realistic physics and motion captured character animations.

name: King Of Fighters XIV: Ryuji Yamazaki
description: Makes Ryuji Yamazki available as an additional playable character

name: King Of Fighters XIV: Rock Howard
description: Makes 'Rock Howard' available as an additional playable character.

name: Bullet Audyssey
description: Save your galaxy from celestial beings using the power of melody as weapons, in this rhythm based shooter where you absorb and fire back element bullets.

name: King of fighters XIV: Vanessa
description: Vanessa lives a double life as a housewife and a mercenary agent. She is highly skilled in boxing and able to KO her opponents with ease.

name: Wally the Seal 2
description:
The new entry in the Wally The Seal series arrives! You were able to escape the mazes last time, but your second go around won't be so easy!

In Wally The Seal 2, your objective is to find and collect 4 mysterious flowers from each of the levels. Use the new Salmon Radar to track the flowers while avoiding Wally The Seal and his partner Mrs. Wally.

name: King Of Fighters XIV: Whip
description: Her background largely remains a mystery, but she closely resembles K's deceased sister “Seirah”.

name: Minecraft: Young Gru
description: Sin descripción

name: Duake
description:
Gaming enthusiast and developer Magic Nipples has released Duake (Doom in Quake). It's a Quake mod featuring the main character (Doomguy) and the original Doom weapons.

"Run through the Quake campaign as Doomguy. It's that easy!" the project's creator explained in the description of the Duake mod.

In addition to the Doom Slayer, the first version of Quake in the Duake mod featured a full arsenal of weapons from Doom, as well as an original interface in two versions (classic and compact from Doom 64).

The mod's source code is published on GitHub. The mod's developer has promised to make further improvements to the project.

name: Transformers: Multi Shock
description: Sin descripción

name: Whites This
description: A 4D maze game, that can help exercise those 4D brain cells.

name: Obama in the Dark
description: Help president Obama solve the mystery of a creepy haunted house!

name: Shrew
description: You are an Etruscan Shrew, the smallest mammal in the animal kingdom. The animal cave is rumored to hold your great grandpa’s treasure. And you’re going to find it.

name: Feed Me Billy
description: Feed Me Billy Demake is a 2020 horror game developed by CrackedGhostGames. It is a 8-bit version of Puppet Combo's Feed Me Billy.
A homebrew Commodore 64 version of the game 2048.

name: Pizza Delivery Survivors
description: Experience the thrill of pizza delivery in a zombie apocalypse! "Pizza Delivery Survivors" combines survival, strategy, and fast-paced action. Deliver pizzas, outsmart the undead, and turn everyday items into weapons to fight for survival.

name: SL The Game
description:
SL The Game puts you in the role of managing the public transport in Stockholm, Sweden. The player is tasked with managing all traffic and the full budget within the inner city of Stockholm, by planning out the metro and busses.

The player can either start with a map without any public transport, or start with the network of 1997.

name: Waznk Zahb
description: The game is based on the hit Arab TV quiz show waznk zahb ( Your weight in gold ) . You have to answer a series of questions on a variety of topics like history , sports , science and if you manage to answer everything correctly you will win the prize ( Your weight in gold ) .

name: Pokémon Covenant
description: A life of poor decisions has led you to this moment, the moment where you commit your greatest transgression. In the final moment, you are saved by a mysterious figure and given a chance at redemption. Can you, with your memories wiped and true goal unclear, fulfil the terms of your unbreakable covenant and be born anew? You must traverse the ethereal land of Varia and overcome the seven Vices that represent the aspects of your shattered heart, endeavoring to collect the mementoes along the way that will allow you to piece together your forgotten past.​

name: Heretic's Fork: Abyssal Update
description: Abyssal Update brings a new OST DLC, New Desktop Customizations, New Character Variants, New Achievements and a new “Torment Mode”!

name: Heretic's Fork: The Savior's Descent
description: Heretic's Fork: The Savior's Descent update includes: Endless Mode Optimization; Torment Modifiers; Japanese Localization; Continue Shift to Endless Mode; Full Controller Support and New Music:

name: Half Billion: Love Choice
description: "Half Billion" is a surreal simulation business interactive game, where you will complete the entrepreneurial journey with a start-up capital of half billion. Six beauty enter your life. How will you balance the relationship? Note that "wealth" and "likability" will jointly determine the your story.

name: Zephyr's Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Half Billion: Love Choice - 2K DLC
description: After downloading, the game graphics can be upgraded to 2K high-definition picture quality

name: Fullbright Presents: Toilet Spiders
description: Eight Legs… Four Eyes… Limitless Terror!

name: Case Hunter
description:
A succession of detective cases to make the city was plunged into chaos… Under the glamorous surface, the city hiding all kinds of evil.

In order to help people restore the peace life, as a great detective you are obliged to do it!

Find out the truth, find the hidden clues, it's time to show your true wisdom!

name: Stunt Dog Adventure
description: The "Stunt Dog Adventure" is a thrilling retro inspired 2D side scrolling action game. Collect bones, solve puzzles, swim and fly to rescue a team of kidnapped All-Star Stunt Dogs!

name: Gloomy Eyes: The Game
description: Within a world where the sun has stopped rising, the darkness awoke the dead from their graves, and an oppressive leader has cast them out. Play Gloomy and Nena, a zombie and a human , on a quest to find the sun in this dark but poetic narrative puzzle game.

name: Claustrophobia
description: Claustrophobia is an Action/Adventure/Puzzle type mod in which you play a rebel in the Half-Life 2 universe fighting and solving his way through areas to get to safety.

name: Storyngton Hall
description: The Green family has moved into a Regency-era mansion in desperate need of renovation! Welcome to Storyngton Hall, a Match 3 home and garden design/renovation game perfect for lovers of romance, exciting tales of lords and ladies, and addictive puzzles and challenges. Solve Match 3 puzzles and help the family renovate, decorate, and design their dream home. Don't forget to take care of the grounds as you surround it with stunning, lush gardens. Unlock new areas to practice your landscaping and interior decoration skills, and invite your friends from Facebook to play together! Unravel the mysteries of Storyngton Hall and its colorful characters: Mrs. Green wishes to be the talk of the town, her daughter Jane dreams of finding true love, and Mr. Green would just like a little relaxation. None will come to pass if the wicked Lady Wroth has anything to say! Are you ready to help make their dreams come true?

name: Hack 0 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Merge Mend
description:
Wow, our cozy hometown is all over the place! What happened here?

Let's roll up our sleeves, rebuild this village, and bring everyone back together!

We're going to transform our town back into the charming and serene place we love!

name: Lolagame
description: Lola Game is a management and simulation game with an isometric perspective. It is a game commissioned by Granarolo, an italian multinational company that operates in the fresh milk and diary-cheese sector. It was released as a free-to-play game on their website alongside a prize competition. The goal of the game is to be able to produce 310 litres of milk every month from the best breed of cows. The player starts in march 2003 with just 3 brown cows, 1 bull and 950 euros.

name: Escape from Elm Street
description:
An interactive flash game based on Nightmare from Elm Street. A must play!
Similar style to Shadowgate on the NES

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 14
description: Roguery rules the waves in Sea of Thieves Season 14: Making Mischief!

name: Fingun Forever!
description: In a horrible tragedy, Casino Karen and her army of giant anime waifus have kidnapped your girlfriend. Pilot Fingun once again and save the day!

name: Droom
description: Droom is a very early 3D escape game originally released by Higo Yoshiyuki in June 2002.

name: Monkey Snowfight
description: Whack the other monkey with snow and 'nana bombs. Pick up bonuses to stay longer in the game.

name: Spearain
description:
SPEARAIN is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly running from side to side. Your goal is to avoid getting hit by the spears falling from the top. Hold a button to run faster and to slow down the spears. You score one point each time you bump into a wall and reverse your direction. Collect the falling coins to score additional points.

The game is over when you get hit by a spear.

name: Unctrl
description:
UNCTRL is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to launch guided missiles and hit enemies and their projectiles. The enemies come from the right and constantly shoot. Press a button to fire a missile. The missile will always go down on its own and you can make it go up by holding a button.

The game is over when an enemy projectile hits you.

name: Dicey Chess
description: A chess game in which the throw of the dice decides how far you can move.

name: Sweep Maidens
description: A Minesweeper game in which anime girls assist you. (◕ω◕✿)

name: The Islands of Freedom
description: All you need is to send ships from one island to another.

name: Tinymon
description:
Tinymon RPG is based in an isekai world that resembles Japan. The natives here speak Japanese, however thanks to higher powers you're able to communicate with them in English. Although, if you so wish, you can enable settings from the in-game menu that let you experience parts of the game in Japanese (or romaji). These settings can be toggled on or off at any time, so players that want to turn Tinymon into a full-fledged learning experience can enjoy toggling these settings on at their own pace, as they become more comfortable with their Japanese skills (which you'll have opportunities to learn and practice in the game). Of course, you can leave all of these settings off, and experience the full game in English. Alternatively, you can toggle all of these settings on, and experience the game in complete Japanese.
Tinymon's world setting is greatly inspired by Japanese culture, meaning you can learn about the real world Japan. Thus, Tinymon provides for a laid back experience that focuses on exploration, and education of Japan's locations, customs, culture, and language (to those that are willing). We will even teach you how to use the trains system, some things you should avoid doing in Japan, and the first things you should do after landing in the Japanese airport! (Some of them even should be done before leaving the airport).

name: Balanced
description: A cozy deckbuilder about balancing the forces of nature: sit back, relax, and enjoy this zen game of life and harmony. How long can you keep the scale Balanced?

name: Dead Island 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition contains the Dead Island 2 base game, plunging you into the heart of Hell-A, with intense zombie-slaying action, along with both epic story expansions: Haus and SoLA.

Unleash a new level of carnage with special weapons and stylish gear. Included in the Ultimate Edition you’ll find: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II pack, Memories of Banoi Pack, Golden Weapons Pack, Pulp Weapons Pack, Red’s Demise Pack, and each Slayer’s Premium Skin Pack.

name: Aikatsu On Parade!
description: Aikatsu On Parade! is an arcade collectible card game in Bandai's Data Carddass line of machines. It is the successor to Aikatsu Friends! and a crossover with the past generations of the Aikatsu series.

name: Arcade Archives: Violence Fight
description:
"VIOLENCE FIGHT" is a fighting game released by TAITO in 1989.
The game takes place in America of the early 1960s . Fighters gather from all parts of the USA to get the winning money and the honor by defeating all their opponents in the VIOLENCE FIGHT!

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Australia
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Australia landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Carpet Gallery
description: An endless walker with procedural scenery and objects.

name: Hidden Cats: Halloween
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Halloween" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Spooky
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Spooky" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Hidden Cats: Haunted Mansion
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Haunted Mansion" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge
description: Unlike traditional hidden object games, "Dual Discovery: Unite Challenge" offers you an entirely new treasure-hunting experience! Each mission item is cleverly split into two parts, scattered throughout the picture.

name: Hidden Objects
description: Immerse yourself in the world of hidden object search! In this exciting game you will find many unique locations hand-drawn by the artist. The game will give you positive emotions.

name: Hidden Capybaras with Orange and Pumpkins: Spooky Halloween Edition
description: Celebrate Halloween night with cute capybaras with orange! Find all the hidden capybaras in their Halloween costumes and light up the town on this magical night. A fun-filled adventure awaits you!

name: 100 Hidden Cats: Kitty House 2
description: 100 hidden Cats "Kitten House 2" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find one hundred cats (and one hundred rubber chickens) located on the map.

name: Kill All Lice
description: Play as the egocentric Captain Soepp and the sarcastic Lieutenant Xam'Pu in this wacky RFun & Gun to kill evil at its root by defeating the king of lice, Lous the First! Go solo or team up to stop the infestation spreading across Eloise's family! KILL ALL LICE is a proper soap opera adventure!

name: The Death Night Show
description: You are a sinner. Do you know what happens to sinners when they go to Hell? They appear on Hell's best (and only) late-night television program; THE DEATH NIGHT SHOW! If Death considers you entertaining, he might let you escape a gruesome afterlife punishment. After all, boredom is the biggest sin in Hell! What will your afterlife look like?

name: Doodle Cats
description: Welcome to a playful world of childhood memories! In this fun hidden-object game, your task is to find all the cats, carefully sketched as if by hand in your favorite drawing notebook. Good luck finding them all!

name: InoLab Trials
description: InoLab Trials is a multiplayer game where players compete in a series of skill-based trials, either solo or with friends. Customize your character, tackle challenges, and climb the leaderboards.

name: Art Detective: Hidden Through Ancient China
description: Unveil hidden wonders in masterpieces! Explore Qiu Ying’s iconic paintings with around 700 hidden objects. Relaxing, timer-free gameplay with hints, 6 hours of content. Discover art and mystery!

name: 101 Cute Playland Dogs: Find & Paint
description: Find the cutest dogs hidden in a beautiful hand-drawn illustration and express your creativity by bringing them to life with color! Enjoy a relaxing mix of hidden object and coloring.

name: Boobs Hidden Los Angeles
description: 100 Boobs in all shapes and sizes are waiting for you to be found on the sun-kissed shores of Venice Beach in Los Angeles!

name: Mickey's Robot Laboratory
description: Mickey's Robot Laboratory is a flash game where you can assemble a robot, using the ready-made pieces that you will be offered. The goal is to defeat as many robots as possible with your creation.

name: Doodle Hunt: Halloween Rush
description: Doodle Hunt: Halloween Rush is a thrilling seek-and-find game set in haunted, hand-drawn Halloween scenes. Explore eerie maps, uncover hidden spooky items, and bring them to life with glowing color! A magical Halloween adventure for all ages.

name: Alühn
description: Alühn is a classic 2D Point & Click adventure game which incorporates a verb GUI that resembles games like ZakMcKrackon or Monkey Island. The whole game is riddled with gags, crazy characters but also with a few tricky puzzles that need to be solved.

name: Chess 'n' Blocks
description: Have you ever considered playing Chess and Tetris simultaneously? Guess what? My strange brain did for years; I don't know why. But I finally took the time to create this game. And that's how chess 'n' blocks was born.

name: Crowded Mysteries 2: Winter Romance
description: Unleash your inner detective in Crowded Mysteries 2 Winter Romance, an icy sequel where winter's chill adds a thrilling twist to crime-solving. Have fun as you unravel mysteries, collect clues, and find out what love and broken hearts can make people do, in the snow-covered Mystery City!

name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
description:
Return to Shadow Island in this emulation of the classic PS survival horror, playable on PS5 for the first time.

From the moment Edward Carnby and Aline Cedrac set foot on Shadow Island, they are stalked by mysterious, evil creatures intent on thwarting their quest to find the three ancient tablets that could hold the key to an otherworldly power. Danger lurks at every corner – do you have what it takes to fight back evil once and for all?

name: Holy Shift
description: A short psychological adventure about decisions and choices that will change your future. A visual novel about how you ended up in purgatory and met a Succubus.

name: Orange Roulette
description: Trapped in a prison hell, a desperate orange will play a deadly game in the hopes of getting shipped to safer markets. Can he survive what his captors have freshly squeezed for him?

name: Dusttale: The Murderous Comedy
description:
A complete reimagining of dusttale. New bosses, new areas, many different endings and 3 routes.

The main difference from other dusttale takes, is that here your choices really matter, and even just killing everyone can be done in different ways. As well as giving up killing and getting a good ending. Also remember, Sans is not the main character in this comedy!

name: Bunny Clicker
description: A simple example game about making bunnies, for the Idle Game Maker engine.

name: Spot It
description: Spot It is a game where players quickly find the one object with a different color among many. Each level gets harder with more objects. The goal is to score as high as possible by spotting the unique object quickly. How fast can you spot it?

name: Invasion
description:
Cosmic beings must invade the planet Sunset to settle before their own world is consumed by a cesspool in space. Your mission is to clear the planet's surface in each level before the resupply ships land. In each level, you will face three enemies that you must hit multiple times to eliminate them and clear the area, allowing the ships to land safely. As you advance, the enemies will become faster and more resistant to your bombs, and the enemy fleet will also appear blocking your way to the runway.

This Atari 2600 game challenges you to fight for the survival of your species, no matter the cost.

name: F.E.A.R.: MMod
description:
F.E.A.R.: MMod is about enhancing original game with more gore, new sounds, new effects and gameplay tweaks.

It follows MMod series approach; new effects, weapon replacements, lots of tweaks, gameplay tweaks, graphics enhancements, updated gore.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
description: The Clone Wars has you deep inside the battles of the Old Republic through 16 missions, piloting a range of vehicles including speeder bikes, Republic Gunships and fighter tanks as well as the weapon of the Jedi, your lightsabre, for close combat. Whereas the Rogue Squadron series concentrated on aerial battles, The Clone Wars contains almost all ground battles. You must fight as Anakin Skywalker, Obi Wan Kenobi, Mace Windu, and others throughout the game to prevent the Confederacy from gaining a deadly weapon. Multiplayer options are also included for up to four players with game types including deathmatch, conquest, and a co-op ground and vehicle survival mode.

name: Atlantis Odyssey
description: Welcome to the island adventure of the Atlantis Odyssey game! Here you can not only dip into the exciting world of mysteries but upgrade your traveller skills: this lost civilization needs your knowledge. All you need to join this journey island is just your backpack - the adventure is already waiting for you!

name: Moonlight Frog Inn
description: Moonlight Frog Inn is a simulation game where Titi, a frog who dreams of reaching the moon, runs an inn to make that dream a reality.

name: Doors More Doors
description: Doors Moor Doors is a puzzle-adventure game set in a mysterious underground facility filled with countless doors. Your mission is simple: escape. But finding your way out won't be easy. You'll need to search for items, solve puzzles, and make your way through complex environments, each with its own set of challenges. The game offers a variety of doors to unlock, each leading to new surprises or obstacles.

name: Immortal
description:
Immortal is an RPG horror game/visual novel that tells the story from multiple perspectives and your choices will impact how the story progresses and who will survive until the end. This game looks at the darker side of immortality and the consequences it can have around those close to you. It features realistic situations with a touch of fantasy.

The story follows twenty-two year old Nicholas, who has just gotten off work. After rejecting a co-workers's invitation to go out, he decides to head home. While taking the bus home, he meets a twenty-four year old writer named Morna and the bus driver, twenty year old, Darcey. The bus soon breaks down, leaving Nicholas, Morna, and Darcey stranded outside a large manor. What lies in this manor will not only change how they see the world but also who they are.

name: Power Drill Massacre
description: Power Drill Massacre Arcade is a short adventure horror game developed by Puppet Combo. It is an 8-bit arcade version of Power Drill Massacre.

name: Yoobot Vs. Yoonot
description: A flash game created by the British Heart Foundation in the late 2000s to help educate youth on how to have healthy habits.

name: Soccer in a Box
description: "Soccer in a Box" is a soccer game that supports 2-8 players competing on the same stage. Use various dances to kick all the balls into the opponent's goal!

name: Pac-Athlon
description:
Compete in five different events with Pac-Man and co.!

Pac-Athlon is a minigame that was originally released in 1999 as part of a Japan-only CD-ROM release from Namco known as "Pac-Man no Desktop Daisakusen". This version is a fanmade remake built from the ground-up. It faithfully recreates every aspect of the original while also providing a few new things to play around with.

The Retro Mode covers the game with the classic pixel graphics of Pac-Man's arcade games and a heavy dose of Namco fanservice as you can select from a whopping 17 different characters! You can also compete with friends locally in the game's alternative multiplayer modes!

name: Rockman & Forte FC
description: A demake of Mega Man & Bass in 8-bit style.

name: Sonic Dynamo
description: An adventure-style Sonic fangame, focused on exploration.

name: MegaMan Super Charged
description: Sin descripción

name: Fear Effect
description: An upcoming remaster of the original Fear Effect for modern consoles.

name: Tomba! 2
description: An upcoming remastered version of Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return for modern consoles.

name: Death Note: Killer Within
description: Death Note: Killer Within is an online social deduction game for up to 10 players. Players will be split into two teams with different objectives. To win the game, players will need to figure out each other’s identities and either eliminate L who threatens Kira's power or seize the Death Note.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 3
description: Fikrul’s forces await in the depths of his Revenant fortress. Gather your allies, Guardian, for a new Kell will be crowned.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 2
description: Guardians will raid the Tomb of Elders to rescue Eliksni prisoners and stop Fikrul’s plan to add powerful enemies of the past to his Revenant army.

name: Dai-chan's Great Adventure: World's End
description:
Flowing rivers, rushing waterfalls, unexplored towering trees...
Nitori's adventure begins here and now!

name: Skyward Journey
description: Skyward Journey is a reflective, art-game about guiding birds by creating wind currents. It aims to provide a relaxing and thought-provoking experience, with an interactive score and low-key visuals.

name: Taxi Xtreme Urban Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Mix AI Animal Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Food Courier: Bike Adventure
description: Race the clock and become the ultimate food courier!

name: 4x4 Adventure Rocky Pathways
description: Can you conquer the toughest terrains?

name: Pet Clinic Simulator
description: Welcome to Pet Clinic Simulator, where your love for animals meets your management skills! Build and run your very own veterinary clinic in this charming, customizable arcade idle game.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat
description: In "Rooftop Rascal: The Spooky Cat," take control of a nimble cat scaling fire escapes and rooftops in a Halloween-themed adventure. Test your quick thinking and jumping skills as you climb higher and higher to reach the rooftop.

developers.name: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Hexa River
description: Explore HEXA RIVER, a relaxing puzzle game where you guide water to bring life to islands. Enjoy 40 levels, soothing music, low-poly visuals, and rewarding achievements as you help crops thrive.

name: Chained Survive Together
description: Sin descripción

name: The Body Cam Project
description:
The BODY CAM project is an exciting first-person team shooter that puts players in the
shoes of elite law enforcement officers equipped with surveillance cameras. The action takes place in a city overrun by criminal syndicates, and players must work together to restore justice and order by completing a number of responsible missions.

name: Pixicharm Collection 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Goober Arena
description: *Goober Arena* is a fast-paced PvP battleground where squishy combatants slam, bounce, and trap each other in chaotic, goo-filled arenas. Customize your Goober, master tricky traps, and outwit opponents in online multiplayer madness!

name: Tsunagari Chess School
description: A psychological horror game taking place in a Japanese chess school. Get to know the girls, go on dates, and prepare for the worst.

name: Air Force Missions
description: You will pilot an helicopter with your more or arrow keys. It is very easy to move, because though it is 3D, you can only move in 2D. Prepare yourself, because this is going to be a hard war. You will have to destroy the armies of ground, air and water weaponry. Your helicopter will be attacked by other helicopters, jeeps, jet fighters, aircraft carriers, battleships, and any kind of enemy. Water, desert, mountains,... all of them are dangerous and full of enemies to destroy.

name: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N.
description: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N. is a classic match-three puzzle game with a couple of clever twists. Similar to classics like Puzzle Bobble, the playing field is set before you start, and it’s your job to fire red, green, blue, purple, and yellow bubbles at the ones hovering above your porous yellow skull. You can bank shots off the walls, and you fire by holding your finger on the screen and pulling back.

name: Long Drive North
description: Explore and survive the harsh American wilderness in the Long Drive North. Drive and repair your trusty old RV, scavenge for parts, hunt and cook to survive; all alone or with up to 4 players in co-op. No zombies or monsters await – just an immersive driving-exploration-survival experience.

name: Truck Driver Go
description: Truck Driver Go is a free-to-play driving sim mobile game where you'll take on various trucking missions, explore different locations, and follow a compelling narrative. Truck Driver Go offers the ultimate truck-driving experience inspired by the hit game Truck Driver game. Take on the role of David, who sets out to restore his father’s legacy and make a mark in trucking history. Embark on an emotional journey as you follow an intriguing narrative, while transporting different cargo across a network of roads.

name: Christmas Hustle
description: Christmas Hustle is a Christmas-themed hidden object game. Help Santa's elves to pack the presents to their respective reindeers.

name: WALL-E
description: Sin descripción

name: Geometry Shooter Pro
description:
Geometry Shooter PRO takes the exciting foundation of the original Geometry Shooter and cranks it up to the next level! Jump into this hand-drawn arcade game where precision meets action.

Fire from a moving cannon at expanding geometric shapes like circles, squares, and triangles, all while mastering the art of perfect shots and crazy combos.

In this enhanced version, experience brand-new PVP and CO-OP modes, where you can team up or compete with friends for the ultimate score.

No more game-overs after a single mistake! Now you have 3 lives to keep the fun going! Plus, discover bonus balls with unique effects that add new layers of strategy..

Whether you're a fan of the original or a new player, Geometry Shooter PRO promises even more challenging and exciting gameplay. Can you master the art of the perfect shot?

name: Kung Fu Panda
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is a videogame by (presumably now defunct) Wonderfling Studios. It was developed to pair with the song Labyrinth off of Joe Hawley's project Hawaii: Part II. It essentially functions as a playable version of the original music video.

name: Click Mage
description: Click Mage is a 2D resource clicker and building game. Mine and process resources, upgrade your clicking power and construct buildings on an idyllic island with beautiful pixel art graphics.

name: Fast:Run
description: Fast:Run is an exhilarating, fast-paced running game that challenges your reflexes and speed. In this game, Your goal is to navigate through these obstacles as quickly as possible without crashing.

name: Un:logical
description:
Participation in the VR game "Un:logical" is by invitation only.

You are welcomed to this virtual world, where one's senses of touch, taste, and pain are real, by the adorable "Apprentice Angel".

Those who participate will later find themselves threatened by the "side effects" caused by the game...

name: Deep Snow Delivery
description:
Humanity is on the brink of extinction due to a self-inflicted ice age. Navigate the frozen wastes in an ancient WW2 tank fitted with a storage bucket and claw arm. Collect and sell junk, make deliveries between underground settlements, navigate mountainous terrain, and buy upgrades to make your job easier.

Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity’s mistakes. Will your story be different?

name: Farm Frenzy Prostokvashino
description: Fun farm. Prostokvashino is a spin-off from the Farm Frenzy series of games.

name: 20Q
description: Sin descripción

name: 20Q: The Simpsons
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Trek: 20Q
description: Sin descripción

name: Lunchy
description: You find yourself conveniently in the Lunchy factory after closing, your stomach rumbles, you're hungry. Your tasked to craft your own Lunchy meal to satisfy your hunger and escape.

name: Tartaros
description: Jump into a retro-style puzzle adventure that tells the mythical story of Hades and Persephone. Play as Persephone and use magical powers to escape. Encounter mythological creatures, immerse yourself in atmospheric journey and find your way out of the underworld!

name: 5 Intelligent Strategy Games
description:
a collection of 5 board games including:

- Backgammon
- Chess
- Bridge
- Go
- Draughts

name: Mouselash
description: Mouselash is an action roguelite where you are the mouse cursor. Create your build by combining weapons and stats as you satisfyingly pop waves of enemies!

name: You Can't Save Her
description:
You have three seconds to kill your former friend.

The nuns and sacred algorithms have willed it.

And no matter how much you want to save her, you can’t.

name: Becoming Saint
description: Choose your doctrine and preach across medieval Italy in this real-time strategy roguelike. Gather your diverse cast of followers, venture out to convince and convert new believers, conquer towns, and strive to become a saint in your lifetime — or die trying.

name: DZ & Riggy Vs. the Fantasy World
description: Sin descripción

name: Em Busca dos Tesouros
description:
In command of the adventurer H. Unter Kid, the player must explore the terrible T. Nebrous Land in search of incredible treasures, but not before facing unique and hostile creatures, such as the Crazy Scorpion and the Big Head Kannibal!

Pitfall! heavily inspired this game, initially released for the ZX81 line of computers, but is now available on the Atari 2600!

name: Fishdle
description:
The only daily game in the word focused on fish, Fishdle is the brainchild of a keen angler who’s specially chosen fish with unique profiles that those who really know there fish will be able to get. Be warned, there are some tough ones that will test the mind of even expert anglers.

Guess the fish from the profile and score points – the fewer hints you need, the more points you score. There are over 50 different fish to guess – one a day. Share the game on social media to build your fishing karma!

name: Tuonela
description: Tuonela is a roguelike survival game where you will choose among many heroes and battle your way through the endless hordes of undead, demons and many other foes. Set in medieval times and using 90s graphical look. Venture deep in the savage realm of Nendhir alone or with your friends. Gain new powers, collect gold to unlock more heroes and descend down to the dark hellish realms of madness and despair.

name: Swan's Room
description:
Escape adventure game.
Can you escape from the room?

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants!
description: When an episode of the popular series The New Adventures of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy is supposed to be filmed in Bikini Bottom and nobody shows up to audition except for one yellow sponge, the show is put on hold. With the show in danger of being canceled, the show's producer, Gill Hammerstein, makes it SpongeBob's job to collect props and find actors for the show to go on.

name: Grisù Tales from Dragontown
description: Discover "Grisù Tales from Dragontown", the PC game for children that brings the adventures of Grisù from the TV series into your living room! With 4 intuitive challenges (Racing, Photoshooting, Recovery, Exploration) and original scenes, experience the emotions of Dragontown. Fun guaranteed!

name: The Children of Clay
description: The Children of Clay is a short stop motion archeology horror game, where you have to study an ancient artefact and discover its dark secret.

name: Kingdom Hearts: Card Struggle - Spider Solitaire
description:
Kingdom Hearts Card Struggle -Spider Solitaire- is a mini-game application available through Kingdom Hearts Mobile. It is a Kingdom Hearts-themed version of the card game Spider.

Kingdom Hearts Card Struggle -Spider Solitaire- was released on January 22, 2009. It was discontinued on April 30, 2013 along with the rest of Kingdom Hearts Mobile.

name: Shigatsu Youka
description: Sin descripción

name: Onion Detective 2
description: The sequel to the acclaimed game "Lil Onion Detective"! Play as Detective Onion and solve all the crimes in your little town!

name: Disaster Blaster
description: Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you play as a mad scientist using a powerful simulator to engineer the most devastating weapon in the universe.

name: Call Me Master
description:
Slip into the future and turn into a slave to love?

"Call Me Master" is an otome dating game that will transport you to the future, where you will meet an enigmatic, attractive man!

name: Nonogram Halloween
description: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: 8-Bit Lair
description: Traverse a wicked corporate skyscraper, global headquarters of Vincent Vector, hacker billionaire and spoiled genius. Will you be able to stop his bogus plot to shred the physical world and bring it all into his vast Virtual Reality? Find out in this radical '80s mini golf adventure.

name: Scribe
description: Scribe is a scribe simulator in which you can secretly shape the destinies of the inhabitants of the estate: resolve disputes, influence the course of family intrigues, decide who lives and who does not. Choose what to write in letters and whether to change their recipients!

name: Move Out Manor
description: A grid-based action puzzle game set in a haunted mansion. Wander halls, find keys, and pack up items while avoiding spooky ghosts. Move out quick, or you may become a permanent resident.

name: Treat-Seeking Tricksters
description: Explore the mysteries of a street which only appears after sundown on Halloween night! Get as much candy as possible by judging which houses have candy and avoid those which instead hide nasty tricks.

name: Bloody Rune
description: Turn-based single-stroke drawing roguelike deck-building game. Draw and use various runes to defeat all enemies and win the Rune War.

name: The Blackwood Legacy
description: A first-person puzzle horror game set in the eerie halls of Blackwood Manor. Solve intricate puzzles, unveil long-held secrets, and decipher the mystery surrounding your father's disappearance.

name: Circle
description:
"Circle" is a fast-paced, addictive arcade-style game designed to test your reflexes, precision, and strategic thinking as you navigate a deceptively simple yet increasingly intense circular arena. At first glance, "Circle" may seem straightforward, but the challenge quickly escalates, drawing you into a thrilling loop of action, suspense, and quick decision-making. The primary objective is clear: collect as many points as possible to achieve the highest score, all while dodging the ever-present and multiplying threats of black dots that are relentlessly poised to end your run.

In "Circle," you take control of a small, vividly colored sphere that glides smoothly around the perimeter of a circle, responding instantly to your commands. The arena's clean, minimalist design emphasizes fluidity and sharp focus, immersing you fully in the task at hand. Points, represented by glowing orbs, appear randomly within the circular arena, waiting to be collected by your agile sphere. Each successful collection adds to your score, pushing you further into the game’s escalating difficulty. What starts as a leisurely pursuit of points soon transforms into a frantic dash as the black dots, your primary antagonists, begin to multiply.

name: Mechanic Supermarket Simulator
description: Gear up and take the wheel in Mechanic Supermarket Simulator! Build, manage, and expand your very own automotive retail empire. From stocking shelves with cutting-edge car parts to mastering market trends, can you create the ultimate one-stop shop for car enthusiasts?

name: Khodam: The Contract
description: A True First-Person Psychological Horror game inspired by Indonesian folklore about the protective unseen spirit, 'Khodam.' Play as Dara, a famous Southeast Asian horror streamer, as she unravels strange anomalies and seeks to uncover her true identity.

name: Wings of Njord
description: Soar through a medieval world of mystery and serenity as a raven on a journey to uncover hidden wonders.

name: Voodoo Strikers
description: Unleash your competitive spirit with this local multiplayer sports game! Random fields and unique ball physics make each match different!

name: WolfFang Skull Fang Saturn Tribute Boosted
description:
The steel wolf running across the earth × the sonic corpse that buries its prey.
DECO shooting game redeployed!

name: Bronana
description: Bronana is a thrilling and hilarious survival roguelike. Embody the spirit of a fearless banana warrior to take down waves of vicious snack monsters. Through a rich variety of random events, grow stronger, evolve abilities, and face off against challenging bosses to save the homeland.

name: Magical Bakery: Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to a magical, flour-filled world!

name: Miyamoto
description:
Open the board game, place your pieces, and get ready!
A casual deck-building x Japanese-themed card game!

name: Mall Manager
description: Stock the shelves and run the mall

name: Hentai Girls: Autumn Crush
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Ghost Assassin: Stealth Strike
description: Embark on a stealthy adventure—eliminate foes, remain invisible.

name: Eggconsole Murder Club PC-8801
description: Detective J.B. Harold rushes to solve a mysterious murder case that occurred in the outskirts of Liberty Town.Uncover the truth of the case!

name: Eggconsole Undeadline MSX2
description: A fantasy-themed action shooting game with a high level of difficulty, but it's a well-crafted title that offers a satisfying and challenging experience.

name: Ecchi Fever
description: Play and spend time with beautiful girls in the ecchi world.

name: 2weistein in Asban
description: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.

name: Backrooms: Partygoers
description: Backrooms: Partygoers is a backrooms horror game based on Level 0 where you play as a researcher tasked to find anomalies inside the backrooms. You are equip with devices that can beep whenever an anomaly is near, where the partygoers roam and can hear you.

name: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator
description: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator – Where Every Aisle Tells a Story!

name: Captain Barrel
description: Collect all treasure and get the highest score in this pirate platorfming epic though the seven seas!

name: Coloring Pixels: Collection 5
description: A relaxing coloring-by-numbers game. Enjoy completing a variety of images with differing themes, complexity, and sizes.

name: Princess Snow White: The Enchanted Mirror
description: Peace has reigned in the castle and the forest for several years, but a new threat begins to emerge from the dark past of the Evil Queen.

name: SankakkuDoku
description: S.O.S! Astronaut Aki-chan needs your help urgently....

name: Sinvers on Wheels
description: Crazy racing game where the tracks change every game!

name: Sugoi Girls: Vivacious Vampire
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Skater Bunny Simulator
description: Unleash your skate skills and hop to new heights with Bunny Skater!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Chrotopia
description:
A world where only black and white exist.
“Chro”searches for his sister in various places.

name: Princess Rapunzel: The Kingdom's Legacy
description: This novel follows Rapunzel, who, after restoring peace to her kingdom, discovers that her legacy holds even more secrets

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures 3
description: In Moorhuhn Jump and Run ‘Traps and Treasures 3’, 31 levels full of traps and enemies await you!

name: Model Debut3 #Nicola
description: A fashion game where your unique, cute style comes to life!

name: Kingdom Coronation Collection
description: This is the ultimate Kingdom collection, containing the following entries in the award-winning strategy series: Kingdom New Lands, Kingdom Two Crowns, Kingdom Two Crowns: Norse Lands, Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus, and Kingdom Eighties.

name: Idle Command: Supply Frontline
description: Fortify your base, care for your troops, and command victory in every battle!

name: Indian Princess: Dress Up!
description: Become a stylist and design traditional and modern Indian outfits! Create typical looks that are unique for weddings and festive events, showing all your creativity.

name: I Love Finding Wild Friends: Collector's Edition
description: Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!

name: House of Horror: 7 Psychos
description: Face seven deadly psychopaths, each guarding a terrifying floor. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and exploit their weaknesses to escape the nightmare.

name: Easy Cute Clean Up Lesson
description: Let's put the scattered items back where they belong! Practice tidying up with a fun game, and soon you'll be able to tidy up your own room too!

name: The Legacy of Robin Hood
description: Robin Hood's daily routine is interrupted by the arrival of a foreign messenger announcing a tournament hosted by the enigmatic Duke DeMontfort.

name: Last Rites
description:
Last Rites is a hand-drawn 2D fighting game set in a dark fantasy world overrun with monsters. You play as one of 3 characters — the Gravedigger; Reilia, the Vampire; and Reiner, the Knight — all with unique movesets and playstyles. The characters each have their own set of color palettes, as well as a home-field stage with 3D environments and a corresponding music track.

Play against friends at the computer or on the couch in Versus mode, go solo and battle your way through the Story and Arcade modes, or improve your skill and learn new combos in Training mode.

The game was made in 9 months by Media Design School Game Art Bachelor students.

name: Horizon Journey
description: Embark on an epic adventure to Mars in Horizon Journey, an open-world survival game that blends colonization, terraforming, and exploration in both single-player and multiplayer co-op modes. You're tasked with the monumental challenge of making Mars a new home for humanity.

name: Melon Head
description: Melon Head is a fantastical point and click adventure set in a delirious imaginary world.
